description: Maps client sub-accounts to their Test and Production environment IDs, and controls which SSO groups can manage extensions for each account. Parallels the DevAccountAccess pattern for client accounts that consume Integration Packs.

fields.name: testEnvironmentId
fields.description: Environment ID for Test env in this client account

fields.name: prodEnvironmentId
fields.description: Environment ID for Production env in this client account

fields.name: ssoGroupId
fields.description: Azure AD group object ID for managing this client account's extensions

fields.name: integrationPackInstanceId
fields.description: ID of installed Integration Pack instance

fields.name: lastExtensionSyncAt
fields.description: Timestamp of last Test to Prod copy (format: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z')

fields.name: lastExtensionSyncBy
fields.description: SSO user email who last performed copy

matchRules.description: Compound match on client account ID and SSO group ID

sources.name: EXTENSION_ENGINE
sources.description: Updated by extension management processes for sync timestamps

notes: Parallels the DevAccountAccess pattern for client accounts that consume Integration Packs. Compound match key (clientAccountId + ssoGroupId) allows multiple SSO groups per account.
